description:
Unleash the ancient power of black obsidian with this stunning 10-inch Moon Knife, expertly Knapped into a crescent-moon blade and bound with pristine white thread. Known as the “regal warrior of stones,” black obsidian has been prized for millennia for its ability to clear negativity and shield its bearer from harmful energies.

Crafted for both display and ritual work, this crystal athame:

Banishes Negative Energies: Forms a protective barrier around your aura, dispelling unwanted vibrations.

Supports Spiritual Growth: Encourages introspection and personal transformation by revealing hidden truths.

Grounds & Balances: Connects to the root chakra, fostering stability, courage, and centeredness.

Artisan Handcrafted: Each blade is uniquely flared and hand-wrapped, ensuring no two pieces are alike.

Whether used in ceremonial rites, altar work, or as a striking décor piece, this Obsidian Moon Knife is your companion for protection, clarity, and inner strength

Obsidian Lava Blade Knife,Black Obsidian Athame, Crystal Knives,Obsidian Dagger,Obsidian Knives,10"Inches.
